content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The negotiation stalled because we could not agree on a price. I was looking for €900, which is the usual price for this kind of apartment, while the potential tenant Yi-Nuo Wang was offering €800 at the beginning and then €850, €875, and finally €880 as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Yi-Nuo Wang, as a 10.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question seems to be asking for a reason why I did not feel discriminated or offended, which I appreciate, but since I didn't feel that way, I don't have a reason to provide.
name: Peter Schmidt
